abstract.p: Leatherman and Swiss Army knives noted; photo (Father's Day Pulse column) (S)

block.p: For actual and virtual campers, the Victorinox Swiss Army and Leatherman companies offer high-tech versions of their traditional knives that include computer-specific tools. Besides the usual blades, screwdrivers and corkscrews, the Swiss Army Cybertool ($89.99) and the Leatherman Wave ($104) include wrenches and screw heads designed to install computer cards and to make desktop or laptop adjustments. Last-minute shoppers can order online from Urbanfetch.com, which will deliver within an hour if you live in Manhattan or Brooklyn Heights. Because the only thing that beats virtual camping is virtual shopping.
